# [Interview #587: TOM Signing Report - Sarayne, Entry #41](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=587#41)

#### Question

There was a really strong channeler. Will she be back?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It's likely.

#### Footnote

This might refer to either Sharina or Talaan.
